plot: Virgílio, meets Carmen, a beautiful woman and tries to understand why she almost committed suicide with pills. He takes her with him to the south. What he don't knows (and will never do) is why two mobsters are following her.
title: 1 Motivo
plot_es: Virgílio, meets Carmen, a beautiful woman and tries to understand why she almost committed suicide with pills. He takes her with him to the south. What he don't knows (and will never do) is why two mobsters are following her.
plot_en: Virgílio, meets Carmen, a beautiful woman and tries to understand why she almost committed suicide with pills. He takes her with him to the south. What he don't knows (and will never do) is why two mobsters are following her.

produce.name: Instituto do Cinema, Audiovisual e Multimédia (ICAM)
